name: Heroes of Dawn (Demo 1)(Windows)
description:
Part in Demo

Atha, after having a strange dream decides to go on an adventure with her shy  tiefling friend, May. After gathering supplies and saying goodbye to everyone in town, The two of them meet up with a seemingly confident archer with the ability to tame animals, and a strong dragonborn cleric of war. They all bond over one goal. Finding a female merchant who is going through a bandit infested forest.

This is a very decent game. I'm working with my friends to make it better. Hope you like it...and it's playable. PLEASE GIVE ME FEEDBACK!!
